channel.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/7776/1plm.png[/img]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Hate and trolls are not welcome in this thread[/SIZE], I will not reply anymore beacuse some trolls seem to think there allways right....[/FONT]
[SIZE=3]We have been developing this server for over 2 and a half years from an old very glitch base, After lots of hard effort and trail and error's we now have developed it into a very stable server with lots of custom features. We have advertised it in the past under a different name. This time we are back! with a fresh appearance!![/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Regular updates will be posted at our forums - [URL=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.uk]Click here[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Latest update: x100 combat system fully working[/SIZE]
[SIZE=7][COLOR=red]Join this amazing server today![/COLOR][/SIZE]
- Fully working x100 hits in both PVM/PVP
- Fully working Claw spec (Perfected)
- No known glitches with the new x100 system.
- Nex - Corp - Countless number of bosses~
- All armour and items in 659 cache has been addded with correct stats and gfx/Anim
- Decent drop rates
- Easy to make money
- Good Economy
- Great selection of items available in shops
- Lots of donator benefits from the pkshop/donatorshop
- Curses work in both pvp and pvm (Fully working) + Custom effects against bosses
- Lots of custom events and ways to receive items.
- Fully working makeover mage
- Custom Nex combat system
-1 Click combat (PVP/PVM)
-1 Click pickup
-Weekly updates with developers that can basically achieve anything. Where time is available.
-Lots of more positive content....
(This is not a leech)
[SIZE=4](NOTE some of these screenshots where taken about 1 & half years ago...)[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/3757/zqq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/5392/m5a.png[/img]
[img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/3116/donations2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/6151/adver2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/3287/pic6xy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/8471/pic7h.png[/img]
[SIZE=5]For webclient please visit [url=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.uk/webclients/Webclient659.php]Unorthodox 659[/url]
For our JAR Client please visit [url=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.uk/webclients/UnorthodoxGaming659(JAR).jar]Unorthodox 659 - JAR Client[/url]
For our Client Package please visit [url=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.uk/webclients/UnorthodoxGamingPackage.zip]Unorthodox 659 - Client Package[/url]
Visit our Website - [url=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.uk]Unorthodox Gaming[/url][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2594/unorthodoxteamsigniture.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
item.dc:creator: @gregsterere gregsterere
item.description:
@gregsterere wrote:

If you actually took a look, and played you may notice it is actually one of the most stable and advanced 562s out there. Not focusing on content but stability. but yes I do agree with partly what your saying about my title, but Its there to get noticed, I’m not giving false indications because a lot of players say its the best 562 they have every played and truly there is no way to compare.

I know what you mean but I have had a lot of flaming by mezzy in other post and even other forums so I hate him because of that and I still think he was just trying to cause trouble…

and his hate actually ruins the topic so its not critique, if he actually wanted to be nice he could of easily pm’ed me.

Read full topic
item.source: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more

item.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I can’t even remember the last time Mezzy and I posted on the same thread, proving the latter incorrect.
There is nothing true about this being “the most advanced 562+ out there” and that’s what he pointed out. So basically he was right.

Read full topic
item.source: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more

item.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
item.dc:creator: @gregsterere gregsterere
item.description:
@gregsterere wrote:

Someone getting there knickers in a twist here ^^, Don’t even start with Mezzy lol, he’s the biggest troll going, I’ve never slated other servers. Never mind on there advertisement threads, that’s just him being a troll and childish TBH. Don’t tell me he hasn’t because I’ve seen him do it plenty of times.

Also you talk a lot about “Critque”, there’s a big margin between critque and slating because all the stuff he said was not true. If it was true I would of listen but he is just being his usual self.

I’m guessing your one of his friends/Staff so I’d be careful because I’ve heard Mezzy will be coming back online… You will get what you give. Don’t forget.

Read full topic
item.source: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more

item.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Why are you calling Mezzy a troll? I hate it too when people dub their creations for somthing it isn’t…
The pictures are too big, you’ve overdone the text effects, you don’t accept critique, you don’t even bother paying attention to your spelling, you’re creating multiple accounts to bump your thread, … either accept critique and do somthing with it or gtfo

Read full topic

@jc22493 wrote:

gregsterere:

Why can’t I bump a thread, most other forums allow you to do so every 24 hours. And what you say has no meaning, how can people see a thread when its 5 pages down? Thanks for the insult bro.

I said don’t create multiple accounts to bump your own thread. If I see it again, your thread will be removed and you will be banned from posting in this section.

Read full topic

item.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
item.dc:creator: @gregsterere gregsterere
item.description:
@gregsterere wrote:

Elrick:

Seeing as this thread is being revived, I would suggest updating the advertisement to reflect the server’s current state, fixing the grammar on this thread to make it more visually appealing, and removing the image that says “Get Here Your F Cape”, as it does not make sense and is in black and red… so it blends right into the actual image.

Thanks for the feedback, I’ve made a few more images and deleted the old JAD one, for the grammar ill update that soon.

Mezzyscape562:

Might telling us how this is the most advanced 562+ today? Do you have anti-bot protection?

Might? do you mean mind? and you and who ever else uses that mezzyscape562 account, just troll other competing 562+ servers which is just simply childish to be honest. you have too much time on your hands if you constantly troll others.

And for your question, I wouldn’t tell you even if we did. I’m not releasing the server so there’s no way that I’d list the security features.

-Greg

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gregsterere gregsterere
item.description:
@gregsterere wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:479925”][quote author=gregsterere link=topic=598161.msg4214611#msg4214611 date=1360058119]
Bump.
[/quote]

Why didn’t you acknowledge the post made by Teemo about “something that can potentially harm” his computer?[/quote]

Im sorry, i didn’t see his post. I can ensure everyone that the client is safe and virus free, If you dont believe me you could use our webclient.
I dont know what error he got but im gussing its his anti-virus playing up. They sometimes warn you about batch files (.Bat), but there is nothing to worry about beacuse its clean.

-Greg

Read full topic
